title: League of Legends Malfunction in Game (Maybe from Lunar Revel Patch)
body: Around like 16-20 min. a game on Aram, Summoner's Rift, or Twisted Treeline my screen starts freezing and on the side the audio keeps on playing over and over itself. I tried uninstalling and then installing League of Legends but I still keep getting the same problems. This has never happened to me before but ever since the new patch the showed the Lunar Revel I started malfunctioning like so. Riot or just anyone can you all help me with this situation. Thank You!

replies.body:
Hey XXXKINGTEN10XXX!

Thank you for bringing this issue to the Help and Support Community.  From everything in your original message, this strongly seems like the root cause is a hardware issue.  If your screen freezes, and your audio glitches 16 to 20 minutes into the game, it strongly seems like your system is locking up from lack of available RAM, possible faulty drivers, an overheating Graphics Card, or other hardware related causes.  Since it is incredibly difficult to pinpoint the exact issue at this moment, I strongly recommend that you complete all of the steps from our Knowledge Base Article regarding hardware issues, found here:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/22167780

If you are still experiencing issues, regardless of completing all of these steps, then please let us know here in Player Support by creating a new [Support Ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new), and include the following latest information so that we can investigate the root cause:

1) Dxdiag information: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20100477-obtaining-a-direct-x-diagnostic-or-dxdiag

2) Please send your most recent r3d log where you experienced the problem (You'll notice that the file name starts with the date/time and ends with r3dlog.txt): https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/22128450-League-of-Legends-Logs

3) Process List: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20132988-obtaining-a-process-list
